thread.title: Beyoncé and Ciara Have a Superhero Celebration
thread.title_full: Beyoncé and Ciara Have a Superhero Celebration -- The Cut

author: Dayna Evans
title: Beyoncé and Ciara Have a Superhero Celebration
text:
Squuuuadddd.
Over the weekend, singer/dancer/overall inspirational figure Ciara celebrated her 30th birthday at a surprise superhero-themed party , organized by her doofy Batman boyfriend Russell Wilson. Only a week before Halloween, all the best people turned out for CiCi , willingly dressing up like superheroes to show the beauty some love. Beyoncé , Kelly Rowland, Serena Williams , and La La Anthony all appeared in a shot from the party and boy, this looks like a movie we'd like to see green-lit as soon as possible. Hollywood, are you listening? Talk about a squad.
